title: The Stone Tape (1972) DVDRip XviD EN
description:
Nigel Kneale&#039;s classic ghost story The Stone Tape, first broadcast by the BBC in 1972 and repeated once only in 1973, represents some of his finest work outside of his justly legendary Quatermass series.

A team of scientists eager to discover a new recording medium takes over a brooding gothic mansion recently renovated by their employers, Ryan Electrics. On moving in, however, they find that one vital room remains unfinished, and that the builders refuse to work there.

Claims of strange noises and feelings of unease are dismissed as nonsense by all except the psychically sensitive Jill (Jane Asher). However the scientists soon discover that they renovation work on the mansion is only skin-deep, and that something lies hidden beneath the stonework of the building, something ancient and malevolent...
